Text:
To,
Scena4all

I have a question to you about your torrent:-http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6677888/Video.Thumbnails.Maker.v3.0.0.4.Incl.Keymaker

Where is the serial provided by you?

I. Install
2. Click on the VTM_Keymaker ,then its asks for the 
Serial.
Where is the Serial man??????????? 
what is the Serial?????

The serial is provided by the application

Install the application. Run Video Thumbnails Maker. On the left hand side you should see Your Status common, click that then it should open the activation window and then on the right hand side below you should see Serial, copy the serial into the keymaker and it should give you the activation key, paste that in the textbox below the serial and click save. Then you should be running with a full version of Video Thumbnails Maker.
This isnt the fight, just a video package for it. Fucking douchbag.
